sourcesContent:
import { Eye, Edit, FileText, User, CheckCircle } from 'lucide-react'; import { useState } from 'react'; export default function IssueCard({ issue, onEdit }) { const [showDetails, setShowDetails] = useState(false); return (

{issue.issueTitle}

{issue.application}

{showDetails && (

Project: {issue.projectName}

Customer: {issue.customerName || 'N/A'}

Reported by: {issue.ntId}

Power: {issue.ratedPower} kW

Speed: {issue.ratedSpeed} rpm

Fuel Type: {issue.fuelType || 'N/A'}

{issue.solution && (

Solution (Added by: {issue.solution.solvedBy})

Category: {issue.solution.category}

{issue.solution.description}

)}
)}
); }
